title: Online Learning Environment Design Workshop for Iranian University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Online learning experience and basic professional field knowledge
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning activities for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields exploring online learning environment design standards for Iranian university students

learning_goals: Learners propose an online education design tailored to the learning needs of Iranian university students using Problem-Based Learning methodology.
Learners develop interactive techniques to enhance learner engagement by applying discovery learning strategies.
Learners create an assessment rubric reflecting the four core criteria: goal-oriented learning, effective instructional methods, socioemotional engagement, and learner autonomy.
Learners propose a blended online learning model considering diverse cultural backgrounds.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
